text: The 2002 Trophée Lalique was the fourth event of six in the 2002–03 ISU Grand Prix of Figure Skating, a senior-level international invitational competition series. It was held at the Palais Omnisports Paris Bercy in Paris on November 14–17. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating, and ice dancing. Skaters earned points toward qualifying for the 2002–03 Grand Prix Final. The compulsory dance was the Austrian Waltz. The competition was named after the Lalique company, which was its chief sponsor at the time. ==Results== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank ! Name ! Nation ! TFP ! SP !
